subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jimmer Fredette of Brigham Young, Nolan Smith of Duke and JaJuan Johnson of Purdue, all seniors, were selected to be on the Associated Press all-American team.
snippet: Jimmer Fredette of Brigham Young, Nolan Smith of Duke and JaJuan Johnson of Purdue, all seniors, were selected to be on the Associated Press all-American team.
